params.amount: The amount of tokens allowed to be used by `spender`
params.spender: The account which will be allowed to spend a given amount of the owners tokens

returns._0: Returns true for a successful approval, false for unsuccessful

params.amount: The number of tokens to send from the sender to the recipient
params.recipient: The account that will receive the amount transferred

returns._0: Returns true for a successful transfer, false for an unsuccessful transfer

params.sender: The account from which the transfer will be initiated

returns._0: Returns true for a successful transfer, false for unsuccessful

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the current allowance given to a spender by an owner

approve(address,uint256).notice: Sets the allowance of a spender from the `msg.sender` to the value `amount`

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns an account's balance in the token

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers the amount of token from the `msg.sender` to the recipient

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` up to the allowance given to the `msg.sender`
